channel.title: Nmap, Ctf, HacktheBox, Htb on PwnFuzz
channel.description: Recent content in Nmap, Ctf, HacktheBox, Htb on PwnFuzz

item.title: Hack The Box - Friendzone
item.description: Today, we are going to pwn Friendzone from Hack The Box. Methodology # Nmap scan of the machine Checking SMB service and HTTP Using dig to get subdomians Uploading PHP reverse shell Callback the reverse shell by exploiting LFI(Local File Inclusion) Getting user flag and SSH credentials Using cronjob to get root flag Nmap #Starting off with the nmap, nmap -sV -sC -A 10.
